document.full_text: proposed cuts for dallas's highly ranked magnet schools have prompted accusations from parents that the administration is using a tight economy to weaken a program it never supported.
document.title: the texas tribune: big cuts for magnet schools in dallas stir conflict over spending on education
lines_and_colors: proposed cuts for dallas's highly ranked magnet schools have prompted accusations from parents that the administration is using a tight economy to weaken a program it never supported.
